problem: Will Tokyo Tower be repainted only once during President Trump's first term?
gt_solution:
Tokyo Tower is repainted every five years 
The last repainting began in 2018
Trump's first presidential term is from 2017 to 2021
facts: Tokyo Tower is repainted every five years
Trump's first presidential term is from 2017 to 2021
decomposition: How long (in years) is President Trump's first term?
How often (interval in years) is the Tokyo Tower repainted?
Is #2 divided by #1 less than two?
